title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When entering an invalid date/time string in the report design, the system does not reject the input and stores it incorrectly.
EB: The system should validate the date value either in the UI or the Model and reject invalid inputs.
SR:
1. Open the report design UI.
2. In the date/time field, enter an invalid date/time string.
3. Verify that the system rejects the input and displays an error message.
